# When & Where

**Date:** August 3-4, 2019, 08:00-17:30  
**Location:** Rm 123, Plant Studio, Plant City

*Parking: Not available. Please consider walking here and enjoy the nice plants outdoors as you do.*

# Set up & Pre-work

To participate in this workshop, you will need to make sure you:  


<br>



#### Install Necessary Packages
Open RStudio and paste the following code into your console, then press Enter to run it:


```{r, eval = FALSE}
# Download packages from CRAN

install.packages(c("devtools", "knitr", "magrittr", "sf", "sp", "rmarkdown", "usethis", "osmdata"))

```


In addition, you will need an up-to-date web browser.
